articles.title: Charlie Sheen’s consequence-free life - Salon.com
articles.description: Netflix's gaze at the star's years of drug-fueled "winning" explains America's weakness for cults of personality.
articles.content:
In my lifetime, I have known my share of Charlie Sheens, sons of wealthy, influential men who could buy their children anything, and out of many problems.
